heading: HR01693
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE COMMITTEES ON TRANSPORTATION AND HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, TO EXERCISE ITS OVERSIGHT FUNCTION AND TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORT THAT THE PROPOSED SOUTHEAST METRO MANILA EXPRESSWAY (SEMME) WILL PASS THROUGH AREAS IN BARANGAY BATASAN HILLS DESIGNATED FOR SOCIALIZED HOUSING AWARDED TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01693
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE COMMITTEES ON TRANSPORTATION AND HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT, TO EXERCISE ITS OVERSIGHT FUNCTION AND TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORT THAT THE PROPOSED SOUTHEAST METRO MANILA EXPRESSWAY (SEMME) WILL PASS THROUGH AREAS IN BARANGAY BATASAN HILLS DESIGNATED FOR SOCIALIZED HOUSING AWARDED TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2018-02-19
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS ON 2018-02-28
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
